alert.note: Alert for San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 22 at 7:58PM MDT until April 23 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 10 PM MDT for gusty winds, low relative humidity values, and dry lighting, for fire weather zones 221, 222, and 225 through 237, which includes the the Wet Mountain Valley, and all of the southeast mountains and plains. The dry lightning may occur across Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca counties... ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect 10 AM to 8 PM Saturday for gusty winds and low relative humidity values, for fire weather zones 224, 222 and 227 through 237, which includes the San Luis Valley, Fremont county, and most of the southeast plains... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 224. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 224. * Winds...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Timing...Saturday from 10 AM to 8 PM. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for extreme rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache
